SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AgressiveStrategy
A virtual player with the aggressive strategy takes all risks to have as many points as possible.
BestJestTrophy
The winner is the player with the highest value Jest.
BestJestWithoutJokerTrophy
The winner is the player with the highest value Jest, but without the Joker.
Card
This is a general card : we define the Trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a SuitCard.
CardVisitor
This interface allows access to the scores obtained by the SuitCards or the JokerCard.
Deck
This class defines the decks : we can shuffle it, fill it...
DeckType
This enum class permits to define the two types of Deck fixed by the design pattern Multiton : the general and the "restOfCards".
DefensiveStrategy
A virtual player with the defensive strategy takes as few risks as possible.
Game
The class starts a game, load or save one, play a round, and determines the winner.
HighestInSuitTrophy
The winner is the player with highest face value card in this suit.
Jest
This class defines the list of Cards that the
invalid reference 
Player
detains during all the game.
JokerCard
There is one joker among the cards.
JokerTrophy
The winner is the Player with the Joker.
LowestInSuitTrophy
The winner is the player with the lowest face value card in this suit.
Main
The class allows the game to run and the player to use the console.
MajorityFaceValueTrophy
The winner is the Player with most cards of this face value.
Offer
In each round, each
invalid reference 
Player
have to make an offer and choose an other one.
OfferCard
An offerCard is a Card in an offer.
Player
This class defines a player, real or virtual.
RandomStrategy
A virtual player with the random strategy makes and takes an offer randomly.
ScoreVisitor
Compute the score of each Jest.
Strategy
The interface creates the methods to make or choose the offer.
Suit
Define each suit and its strength.
SuitCard
It defines a Card with a Suit.
Trophy
 
VirtualPlayer
A virtual player will make an Offer and choose an offer under his Strategy pre-defined.
